website_summaries.verdict: A hard-sided carry-on that comes with maneuverable 360-degree wheels.
pros: Wheels turn all the way around
cons: It could be larger and still fit airline regulations

customer_reviews.title: I love the
customer_reviews.text: Used for trip to Europe- packed for 2 weeks in it, surprisingly spacious and still make carry on. Attractive too. I love the color
customer_reviews.author: KaeriD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have already had tons of compliments on this suitcase! It is very lightweight and spacious, and I love the color and style. I worry with less expensive suitcases that the handle will be flimsy or not long enough, but this case works perfectly as a carry-on, and I haven't had any issues. I was really impressed with the quality considering the low price tag! I have only used it twice so far, so I can't really speak to how durable it is yet, but I will update the review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Very Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This has all the features we were looking for. It fits a lot of clothing and accessories for its size. It is meant to be a carry on, not checked luggage. Not sure how it would hold up if checked. The color is nice. A good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, looks super cool and yet manly. Complies to regulations of most airlines that I know of. Fits in upper compartments of planes. Hold a lot of needed items while traveling. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: June Minick

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for my trip. I liked that it has a hard shell case and that the wheels turn all the way. Made being at the airport easier.
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: No tool to reset lock combination
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with tool to reset lock combination. Everything else good.
customer_reviews.author: RCM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good case and nice looking. Lightweight enough to stow overhead in a flight.
customer_reviews.author: P. Si

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag for the price. I have only taken it on one trip but so far so good. I also purchased the burgundy color for my wife. She really liked the color.
customer_reviews.author: Froilan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: my go to suitcase. Perfect for short weekend trips. Fits everything I need and has held up well. I bought it Dec 2017 and no wheels or anything has given me any problems. I travel 5-6x a year by plane and additional random car trips often.
customer_reviews.author: CCZ

customer_reviews.title: and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Cute, spacious, and easy to handle. Took it to Iowa and it was an easy trip. Holds enough for a long weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle J Bataille

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of them and I absolutely love them! They are surprisingly durable and very well-designed!
customer_reviews.author: cindywang24

customer_reviews.title: Unable to open zipper
customer_reviews.text: No way to open it. Lock was locked with no key included. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased this and now I want one. Cool appearance and rolls like it's on glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Jag

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bag, but I bought it to use as ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag, but I bought it to use as a carry on and its too big to bring in a plane. Pretty tiny for a checked bag. Thoroughly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Easy carry on to put in overhead bins.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very lightweight. Exactly what I wanted and the price was right! One of the best deals I have ever found.
customer_reviews.author: Louise F. Gentry

product_meta.title: Master Massage Novana 20" Expandable Abs Carry-on Luggage, Burgundy
product_meta.description: 20 inches and four wheel molded PC+ABS upright / carryon. Re-engineered lighter weight four wheel spinners allow for effortless 360 degree mobility. Durable ABS exterior with molded corner reinforcement for maximum impact resistance and fully lined interior. Lid features a large u-shaped zipper pocket. Convenient and flexible top and side handles allows for easy lifting. Side bezels allow upright to stand on its side. Four wheel construction allows uprights to be rolled in any direction. Retractable locking handle system. Side mounted TSA approved lock ensures security while traveling and allows airport screeners to unlock, inspect and relock bags without damaging the lock.
feature_bullets: Dimension 13.8" x 9.25" x 18", weight 7.5 lbs. 20" with expandable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
